name: Tavern Events
description: What's happening when the party walks into the tavern? Roll to set the scene!

entries.result: A bar fight is in full swing. Chairs are flying.
A bard is performing badly. The crowd is heckling mercilessly.
Someone just died at their table. Nobody has noticed yet.
A drinking contest is about to begin. They need one more contestant.
The tavern is completely silent. Everyone stares at the party.
A wedding reception is taking place. Free food and drinks!
Two wizards are having a heated magical debate. Small sparks fly.
A dog is sitting at the bar, drinking from a bowl. No one questions it.
The bartender is arm-wrestling customers. Undefeated so far.
A shady figure in the corner keeps making eye contact with the party.
Someone is reading names from a list. A few patrons look nervous.
A gambling game is getting intense. Large pile of gold on the table.
The tavern is hosting an arm-wrestling tournament. Prize is 50 gp.
A patron is loudly complaining about the adventurers who ruined his farm.
The fireplace explodes with green flame, then returns to normal. Nobody reacts.
A group of off-duty guards are drinking heavily and telling war stories.
Someone's pet mimic is loose. It currently looks like a barstool.
A merchant is trying to sell 'genuine' magic items from a coat.
Two parties of adventurers are comparing quest accomplishments loudly.
The bard is singing a song about the party's recent exploits (embellished).
It's trivia night. The current question has stumped everyone.
A noble is slumming it, poorly disguised, fascinated by 'common folk.'
The tavern cat is being worshipped by a group of drunk patrons.
Someone just proposed marriage. Awkward silence follows.
A recruitment officer is looking for soldiers. Offers decent pay.
The cook has quit mid-service. The owner is desperately cooking.
A wake is being held for a local legend. Stories are being shared.
Two rogues are playing a very intense game of chess.
A wild magic sorcerer just sneezed. Roll on Wild Magic table.
The tavern is inexplicably fancy tonight. White tablecloths and candles.
A fortune teller has set up in the corner. First reading is free.
Someone is standing on a table giving an impassioned political speech.
A group is holding an intervention for their alcoholic friend.
The bouncer just threw someone through the door (from outside to inside).
A messenger rushes in with urgent news. War has been declared somewhere.
Someone claims to have seen a dragon flying overhead recently.
A birthday celebration is happening. The birthday person looks miserable.
Two clerics of opposing gods are having a surprisingly civil drink together.
The tavern is being inspected by a very uptight health official.
A retired adventurer is showing off scars and telling increasingly tall tales.
Someone's invisibility spell just wore off in an embarrassing location.
A dwarf and an elf are bonding over their mutual hatred of someone.
The tavern is hosting a 'pets allowed' night. It's chaotic.
A previously banned patron is trying to sneak back in with a bad disguise.
Someone just won big at gambling and is buying drinks for everyone.
A wanted criminal is hiding in plain sight among the patrons.
The tavern's 'house special' is glowing. The bartender insists it's normal.
A secret meeting is happening in the back room. The password is obvious.
Someone just challenged the party to a duel for bumping into them.
A portal briefly opens, something falls through, then it closes.
Roll twice. Both things are happening simultaneously.
